function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased consumption of unhealthy food due to lifestyle changes during the pandemic.","Impact":"Higher risk of obesity, diabetes, and other health issues.","Mitigation":"Promote and provide access to healthy recipes and cooking skills training.","Technologies":"Digital platforms for recipe sharing, online cooking classes.","People":"Consumers, individuals staying at home.","Owner":"Service providers, nutritionists, gym owners."},{"Description":"Lack of access to safe and healthy food options.","Impact":"Risk of consuming unsafe and unhygienic food leading to health issues.","Mitigation":"Provide safe and trusted food products and educate consumers on safe food handling.","Technologies":"Food safety standards, online tutorials on safe food preparation.","People":"Consumers, individuals staying at home.","Owner":"Food producers, suppliers, and service providers."},{"Description":"Dependence on eating out and lack of cooking skills among consumers.","Impact":"Limited ability to prepare healthy meals at home, leading to unhealthy eating habits.","Mitigation":"Offer guidance and support in developing cooking skills and promoting home cooking.","Technologies":"Online cooking tutorials, recipe sharing platforms.","People":"Consumers, individuals staying at home.","Owner":"Service providers, nutritionists, food creators."}]}
